    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCommand(Command command)
      Add the contents of a Command object to the VM Basically write the command id and its parameter(s) into the program memory space
      void addCommands(CommandList commands)
      Launch thread that will add all the Commands in the CommandList to the VM will call completedAddingInstructions on IVMListener after completion
      IVMListener getVMListener()
      Set a listener to listen to events thrown by VM
      void runInstructions()
      Launches thread that does - Run all remaining instructions - starting from current program ptr location will call completedRunningInstructions on IVMListener after completion
      void runInstructions(int numInstrsToRun)
      Launch thread that will Run N number of instructions - starting from current program ptr location will call completedRunningInstructions on IVMListener after completion
      void runNextInstruction()
      Launches thread that will run the instruction the program pointer is pointing at will call completedRunningInstruction on IVMListener after completion
      void setVMListener(IVMListener listener)
      Set a listener to listen to events thrown by VM
